definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: go or come in (Targum Syr.; v. BH III. [[עלל]]);—

definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[עַל]] Da 2:16; c. [[עַל]] pers. v:Da 2:24; c. [[לְבַיְהֵתּ]] Da 6:11, so 3 fs. [[עללת]] Kt, [[עַלַּת]] Qr Da 5:10; Pt. [[עללין]] Kt, [[עָלִּין]] Qr, abs. Da 4:4, Da 5:8.

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: bring in, c. [[קֳדָם]] pers.: Pf. 3 ms. [[הַנְעֵל]] (K:§ 11, 4. b); si Eg, Aram., S-C:G 6, 7, 24, 27 [[הנעלת]]; cf. D:§ 71. 7; Dial.-Proben, p. 4); Da 2:25 ([[ל]] acc. pers.), Da 6:19 (acc. rei); Imv. ms. sf. pers., [[הַעֵלְנִי]] Da 2:24; Inf. [[לְנְעָלָה]] Da 4:3 ([[ל]] acc. pers.); no [[קֳדָם]] pers., [[לְהֶעָלָה]] Da 5:7 (id.).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: (W:CG 225) be brought, subj. pers. +[[קֳדָם]] pers.: Pf. 3 ms. [[הֻעַל]] Da 5:13, 3 mpl. [[הֻעַ֫לּוּ]] v:Da 5:15.
